title: Christian Horner 'proud of achievements' after Red Bull sacking, one year on from scandal
summary: Christian Horner has been released from his position as Red Bull F1 team principal and will be replaced by Racing Bulls' Laurent Mekies

qa_pairs.question: Who was the team principal of Red Bull Racing before Laurent Mekies?
What team is Laurent Mekies associated with after the change in Red Bull's leadership?
What major event led to Christian Horner's departure from Red Bull Racing?
